info.title: Sign-in API
info.description: Represents the Microsoft Entra tenant that the user or application is authenticated to that specified organization.

get.description: Retrieve a list of sign-in objects.

200.description: If successful, this method returns a 200 OK response code and a collection of sign-in objects in the response body.

examples.summary: Show all sign-in activity for the last 7 days

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/signIns?$filter=userId eq 'user1' and (riskLevelDuringSignIn ne 'none' or riskEventTypes_v2/any(r:r ne 'none'))&$orderby=createdDateTime desc

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

examples.summary: Show me logins for mail@domain.com from Mac OS

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/signIns?$filter=userPrincipalName eq 'mail@domain.com' and startsWith(deviceDetail/operatingSystem, 'mac') and isInteractive eq true&$orderby=createdDateTime desc

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

examples.summary: Show me logins for users on Windows

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block
SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block
SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

examples.summary: Get sign-ins from the Safari browser

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

examples.summary: Users who log in using Firefox

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/signIns?$filter=authenticationRequirement ne 'multiFactorAuthentication' and isInteractive eq true&$orderby=createdDateTime desc

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

examples.summary: Users who sign-in to specific application

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/signIns?$filter=appDisplayName eq '<Application Name>' and isInteractive eq true&$orderby=createdDateTime desc

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

examples.summary: Users who sign-in to specific application

value.requestUrl: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/auditLogs/signIns?$filter=appId eq '<application-id>' and isInteractive eq true&$orderby=createdDateTime desc

appliedConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName: SharePoint limited access for guest workers
Medium signin risk block

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

scopes.https://graph.microsoft.com/.default: Access Microsoft Graph using application or delegated permissions

id.description: The unique identifier for the sign-in.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time the sign-in occurred.

userDisplayName.description: The display name of the user.

userPrincipalName.description: The principal name of the user.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user.

appId.description: The unique identifier for the application.

appDisplayName.description: The display name of the application.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the sign-in.

clientAppUsed.description: The client application used for the sign-in.

correlationId.description: The correlation ID for the sign-in.

conditionalAccessStatus.description: The conditional access status for the sign-in.

isInteractive.description: Indicates whether the sign-in was interactive.

riskDetail.description: The risk detail for the sign-in.

riskLevelAggregated.description: The aggregated risk level for the sign-in.

riskLevelDuringSignIn.description: The risk level during the sign-in.

riskState.description: The risk state for the sign-in.

riskEventTypes.description: The risk event types for the sign-in.

resourceDisplayName.description: The display name of the resource.

resourceId.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

errorCode.description: The error code of the sign-in.

failureReason.description: The reason for the failure, if any.

additionalDetails.description: Additional details about the sign-in status.

deviceId.description: The unique identifier for the device.

displayName.description: The display name of the device.

operatingSystem.description: The operating system of the device.

browser.description: The browser used for the sign-in.

isCompliant.description: Indicates whether the device is compliant.

isManaged.description: Indicates whether the device is managed.

trustType.description: The trust type of the device.

city.description: The city where the sign-in occurred.

state.description: The state where the sign-in occurred.

countryOrRegion.description: The country or region where the sign-in occurred.

altitude.description: The altitude of the sign-in location.

latitude.description: The latitude of the sign-in location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the sign-in location.

id.description: The unique identifier for the conditional access policy.

displayName.description: The display name of the conditional access policy.

enforcedGrantControls.description: The enforced grant controls for the conditional access policy.

enforcedSessionControls.description: The enforced session controls for the conditional access policy.

result.description: The result of the conditional access policy.
